document_data.caption: Various fake salves and medicinals.
document_data.name: Salves and Medicinals
document_data.mainbody: '''Scam salves and medicinals''' referred to a variety of items in the Realms used to cheat others out of money.
document_data.Description: These items were available in a variety of containers.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
document_data.Notable Users: * Scam salves and medicinals were often used by [[thieves]] or [[rogues]] to take advantage of those in need of medical attention. A skill thief could get up to 10 [[gold piece]]s per bottle.
